article_title: Is the Budget Deficit Even a Problem?

article_metadata.description: Do deficits, or at least currently projected deficits, matter? It is an age-old question that’s going to get renewed attention in a Congress where Republicans have made no secret of their desire to cut government spending. Of course, cutting spending is not the same thing as reducing the deficit. And many in the [...]
